intro: I'm a React JS developer and design-focused front-end software engineer, passionate about crafting beautiful, intuitive interfaces and seamless user experiences.

about.detail: building things for the web with some awesome people. I've graduated from Aditya Silver Oak Institute of Technology, and got chance to work with Zest Brains and Techflitter.
about.detailSecond: As a software engineer, I enjoy bridging the gap between engineering and design — combining my technical knowledge with my keen eye for design to create a beautiful product. My goal is to always build applications that are scalable and efficient under the hood while providing engaging, pixel-perfect user experiences.
about.skills: Here are a few technologies I’ve been working with recently:

contact.message: My inbox is always open, Whether you have any suggestions or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!
